item.title: Remove
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“J I M M Y, post:2, topic:384578”]Do you want to just change the xp?

If so, you’re going to want to look for this, in client.java

		case 2491:
			// rune essence
			mining[0] = 1;
			mining[1] = 1;
			mining[2] = 1000;
			mining[4] = 1436;
			break;

I believe mining[2] is the exp rate, havn’t messed with a rsps in a while.[/quote]

no. i mean like make it real mining. so you can actually mine ores from rocks…

Read full topic
